pullrequest.title: Do not export urdf symbols in sdformat library (-> default)

content.raw:
A quick test. Install sdformat from packages, compile this branch and install it using ```make install DESTDIR=/tmp/testing```. 

Now let's check for duplicate urdf symbols:
```
nm -D /opt/ros/groovy/lib/liburdfdom_sensor.so /tmp/testing/usr/lib/libsdformat.so | awk '{ print $3 }' | sort | uniq -d | grep urdf
```
```
nm -D /opt/ros/groovy/lib/liburdfdom_sensor.so /usr/lib/libsdformat.so | awk '{ print $3 }' | sort | uniq -d | grep urdf
```
content.html:
A quick test. Install sdformat from packages, compile this branch and install it using make install DESTDIR=/tmp/testing.

Now let's check for duplicate urdf symbols:

nm -D /opt/ros/groovy/lib/liburdfdom_sensor.so /tmp/testing/usr/lib/libsdformat.so | awk '{ print $3 }' | sort | uniq -d | grep urdf

nm -D /opt/ros/groovy/lib/liburdfdom_sensor.so /usr/lib/libsdformat.so | awk '{ print $3 }' | sort | uniq -d | grep urdf
